Properties.ProtectedString:
function waitforchild(parent,child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do wait() print(parent.Name .. " Waiting for " .. child) end return parent[child] end
local Tool=script.Parent local MyHumanoid local IsPlayingMusic = false local KeyDownConnection local KeyUpConnection local ShiftDown = false local MyPlayer local Handle = waitforchild(Tool,'Handle') local Speaker = waitforchild(Handle,'Sound') local content = Game:GetService("ContentProvider")
local HoldAniTrack local PluckAniTrack
local MashMeter=0
local MeltDistance = 30
ApplauseID = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=99187949" content:Preload(ApplauseID)
local PowerChords = { 109619047, --A-- 109618940, --B-- 109618842, --C-- 109618754, --D-- 109618695, --E-- 109618563, --F-- 109618435, --G-- }
local PowerSharpChords = { 109619047, --A-- 109618940, --B-- 109618842, --C-- 109618754, --D-- 109618695, --E-- 109618563, --F-- 109618435, --G-- }
local Pitches = { .5,--G .75,--H 1,--J 1.25,--K 1.5,--L }
for _,i in ipairs(PowerChords) do content:Preload("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..i) end
for _,i in ipairs(PowerSharpChords) do content:Preload("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..i) end
function OnKeyDown(key) print('key is:'..key) Speaker:Stop() local soundID local pitchIndex=0 if key == 'z' then soundID= 1 elseif key == 'x' then soundID= 2 elseif key == 'c' then soundID= 3 elseif key == 'v' then soundID= 4 elseif key == 'b' then soundID= 5 elseif key == 'n' then soundID= 6 elseif key == 'm' then soundID= 7 elseif key == 'g' then pitchIndex=1 elseif key == 'h' then pitchIndex=2 elseif key == 'j' then pitchIndex=3 elseif key == 'k' then pitchIndex=4 elseif key == 'l' then pitchIndex=5 elseif key == '0' then --shift pressed! print('ShiftDown!') ShiftDown=true MyPlayer:GetMouse().KeyUp:connect(function(nkey) if nkey=='0' then ShiftDown=false print('shift up!') end end) end
if pitchIndex>0 then Speaker.Pitch= Pitches[pitchIndex] elseif soundID then --add shift modifier later if ShiftDown then soundID= PowerSharpChords[soundID] else soundID= PowerChords[soundID] end local tspeaker=Speaker:Clone() tspeaker.Parent=Handle tspeaker.SoundId='http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id='..soundID wait(0) tspeaker:Play() local nconnection local startTime=tick() nconnection = MyPlayer:GetMouse().KeyUp:connect(function(nkey) OnKeyUp(nkey,key,tspeaker,startTime, nconnection) end) PluckAniTrack:Play() MashMeter= MashMeter+1 end end
function OnKeyUp(key, keymatch, mySpeaker,timeStarted, connection) if key == keymatch then --enforce minimum note time if tick()-timeStarted < .25 then wait( .25-(tick()-timeStarted) ) end mySpeaker:Stop() Delay(1,function() mySpeaker.Parent=nil end) connection:disconnect() end end
function OnClick() IsPlayingMusic = not IsPlayingMusic if IsPlayingMusic then KeyDownConnection = MyPlayer:GetMouse().KeyDown:connect(OnKeyDown) Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0.01923877, 1.19116962, 0.313162446, 0.49999997, 0.707106769, 0.49999997, 0.0564237535, 0.549525201, -0.833569586, -0.864185274, 0.444996685, 0.23486498)
HoldAniTrack:Play() else Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) HoldAniTrack:Stop() if KeyDownConnection then KeyDownConnection:disconnect() end end
end
function OnUnequip() HoldAniTrack:Stop() end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequip)
function OnEquip(mouse) MyHumanoid=waitforchild(Tool.Parent,'Humanoid') MyPlayer = Game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) HoldAniTrack=MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(waitforchild(Tool,'hold')) PluckAniTrack=MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(waitforchild(Tool,'pluck')) mouse.Button1Down:connect(OnClick) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquip)
function MeltFace(player) -- -- waitforchild(player.Character,'Humanoid').WalkSpeed=0 -- waitforchild(player.Character,'Torso').Anchored=true -- local head = player.Character.Head -- local thead = head:Clone() -- thead.CanCollide = false -- thead.Transparency = 1 -- for _, i in pairs(thead:GetChildren()) do -- if not (i:IsA('Decal') or i:IsA('Mesh')) then -- i:Destroy() -- elseif i:IsA('Decal') then -- head[i.Name]:Destroy() -- end -- end -- local bodyvel = Instance.new('BodyVelocity') -- thead.Position = head.CFrame.p+head.CFrame.lookVector -- bodyvel.velocity = Vector3.new(0,-1,0) -- bodyvel.maxForce=Vector3.new(50000,50000,50000) -- bodyvel.Parent=thead -- thead.Parent=Workspace -- -- local applauseSound = Instance.new('Sound') -- applauseSound.SoundId = ApplauseID -- applauseSound.Parent=head -- applauseSound.Volume=1 -- applauseSound:Play() -- -- wait(3) -- player.Character.Humanoid.WalkSpeed=16 -- player.Character.Torso.Anchored=false end
function MeltNearFaces() for _,i in pairs(game.Players:GetPlayers()) do if i ~= MyPlayer and i.Character and i.Character:FindFirstChild('Head') and (Handle.CFrame.p-i.Character.Head.CFrame.p).magnitude<MeltDistance then Spawn(function() MeltFace(i) end) end end end
while true do if MashMeter>0 then MashMeter= MashMeter-.1 end if MashMeter>9 then print("mashscore= " .. MashMeter) MeltNearFaces() wait(5) MashMeter = 0 end wait(1/30) end

--[[Super Util]]-- function WaitForChild(parent,child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do wait(1/30) end return parent[child] end
function MakeValue(class,name,value,parent) local temp = Instance.new(class) temp.Name = name temp.Value = value temp.Parent = parent return temp end
--[[Constants]]--
local Tool = script.Parent local MyGui = WaitForChild(script,'Gui') --[[Workspace Variables]]--
--[[Script Variables]]--
--[[Script Functions]]-- function OnEquip() Spawn(function() char = Tool.Parent local player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) if player then local tgui = MyGui:Clone() tgui.Parent = player.PlayerGui end end) end
function OnUnequip() local player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) if player and player.PlayerGui and player.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild('Gui') then player.PlayerGui:FindFirstChild('Gui'):Destroy() end
end
--[[Running Logic]]--
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquip)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequip)

Properties.string: Keys H,J,K, and L change pitch
